attributes.action: Reconsider the proposal to compulsilory phase out incandescent lamp bulbs .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fluorescent economy lamps are not universally suitable replacements for incandescent bulbs being unsuitable for such things as infra-red switched lamps, dimmer switches and some ceiling mounted fittings. Much better to await the developoment of LED lamps before making fluorescents compulsory;they are in any case much more efficient hence their use in solar powered lamps. Please think this through thoroughly before legislating.
